src: विमानाने प्रवास करणे हा सर्व वयोगटातील आणि पार्श्वभूमीच्या लोकांसाठी विशेषत: त्यांनी यापूर्वी विमान प्रवास केला नसल्यास किंवा एखादा क्लेशकारक अनुभव घेतला असल्यास भीतीदायक अनुभव असू शकतो. यात लाज वाटण्यासारखे काही नाही: हे पुष्कळ लोकांना असलेल्या इतर गोष्टींच्या वैयक्तिक भीती आणि नावडींपेक्षा भिन्न नाही. काही जणांना, विमान कसे काम करते आणि प्रवासादरम्यान काय होते हे समजून घेण्याने पुरेशा माहिती अभावी वाटणाऱ्या किंवा नियंत्रणात नसलेल्या भीतीवर काही प्रमाणात मात करता येऊ शकते.
mt: Flying is a particularly anxiety-provoking experience for many people, especially those who have never flown before or who have had a traumatic experience in the past. There is no shame in this: it is different from the personal fears and aversions that many people have. Some people can allay their fears by learning how planes work and what happens during a flight, when they have sufficient information to feel in control of the situation.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: आजकाल विमान प्रवासाचे आरक्षण क्वचितच थेट एयरलाईनद्वारे प्रथम शोध घेऊन आणि किंमतींची तुलना करुन केले जाते. कधीकधी समान फ्लाईटकरिता विविध एग्रीगेटर्सवर भिन्न किंमत असू शकते तसेच ते बुकिंग करण्यापूर्वी शोध निकालांची तुलना करण्यासाठी आणि एअरलाइनच्या वेबसाईटवर पाहण्यासाठी पैसे देतात.
mt: Today, booking a flight is rarely done directly with the airline first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have different prices on different aggregators as well as paying money to search results and to look on the airline's website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: आजकाल विमान प्रवासाचे आरक्षण क्वचितच थेट एयरलाईनद्वारे प्रथम शोध घेऊन आणि किंमतींची तुलना करुन केले जाते. कधीकधी समान फ्लाईटकरिता विविध एग्रीगेटर्सवर भिन्न किंमत असू शकते तसेच ते बुकिंग करण्यापूर्वी शोध निकालांची तुलना करण्यासाठी आणि एअरलाइनच्या वेबसाईटवर पाहण्यासाठी पैसे देतात.
mt: Today, booking a flight is rarely done directly with the airline first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have different prices on different aggregators as well as paying money to search results and to look on the airline's website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: कुरियर कंपन्यांना वस्तू लवकर पोहोचवण्यासाठी चांगले पैसे मिळतात. बऱ्याचदा व्यावसायिक दस्तऐवज, विक्रीसाठी माल किंवा  तत्काळ दुरुस्तीसाठी लागणारे सुटे भाग यासाठी वेळ अत्यंत महत्वाची असते. काही मार्गावर मोठ्या कंपन्यांची  त्यांची स्वत:ची विमाने असू शकतात, परंतु इतर मार्गांसाठी  आणि छोट्या कंपन्यांना तिथे काही समस्या आहेत. त्यांनी हवाई वाहतुकीद्वारे वस्तू पाठविल्यास, काही मार्गांवर अनलोडिंग आणि कस्टमच्या प्रक्रियेत काही दिवस लागू शकतात. हे अधिक वेगाने पाठविण्याचा एकमेव मार्ग म्हणजे चेक्ड बॅगेज म्हणून तो पाठविणे हा आहे. एयरलाईनच्या नियमांनुसार एखाद्या प्रवाशाविना सामान पाठविण्यासाठी त्यांना परवानगी देता येणार नाही, आणि याठिकाणी तुमची उपस्थिती आवश्यक आहे.
mt: Courier companies make good money by getting things to their destination quickly. Many times, business documents, goods for sale or spare parts needed for immediate repair are time sensitive. Some routes may have large companies with their own planes, but other routes and smaller companies have problems. If they send things by air, there may be days of unloading and customs processing on some routes. The only way to send things faster is to send them as checked baggage. Airlines' rules say that you can't send things to someone who isn't a passenger, and you have to be present.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: आपण एखाद्या अलायन्समधून आपली फ्रिक्वेंट फ्लायर एयरलाईन काळजीपूर्वक निवडली पाहिजे. तुम्ही सर्वाधिक ज्या विमान कंपनीने प्रवास करता तिलाच पुन्हा जाण्याचे तुमचे मन म्हणत असले तरी, तुम्हाला हे माहित असायला हवे की दिल्या जाणाऱ्या सवलती अनेकदा भिन्न असतात आणि वारंवार उड्डाण बिंदू हे एकाच विमान कंपनीच्या ऐवजी इतर विमानकंपन्यात अधिक उदार असू शकतात.
mt: You should carefully choose your frequent flyer airline alliance. If you are most often flying with a particular airline, but your mind is saying to go with another, you should know that the given discounts are often different and the departure points are often more generous with other airlines.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: आपण एखाद्या अलायन्समधून आपली फ्रिक्वेंट फ्लायर एयरलाईन काळजीपूर्वक निवडली पाहिजे. तुम्ही सर्वाधिक ज्या विमान कंपनीने प्रवास करता तिलाच पुन्हा जाण्याचे तुमचे मन म्हणत असले तरी, तुम्हाला हे माहित असायला हवे की दिल्या जाणाऱ्या सवलती अनेकदा भिन्न असतात आणि वारंवार उड्डाण बिंदू हे एकाच विमान कंपनीच्या ऐवजी इतर विमानकंपन्यात अधिक उदार असू शकतात.
mt: You should carefully choose your frequent flyer airline alliance. If you are most often flying with a particular airline, but your mind is saying to go with another, you should know that the given discounts are often different and the departure points are often more generous with other airlines.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: अल्कोहोलिक पेये दमाने प्यावीत. अल्कोहोल प्रत्येकावर वेगवेगळा परिणाम करते आणि आपली मर्यादा माहित असणे हे अतिशय महत्वाचे असते. जास्त मद्यपानामुळे तब्येतीवर होणाऱ्या दूरगामी परिणामांमध्ये यकृतात बिघाड होणे आणि आंधळेपणा व मृत्यू होणे यांचा समावेश आहे. अवैधरीत्या बनवलेली दारू पिण्याने संभाव्य धोका अधिक वाढतो. अवैध स्पिरीटमध्ये विविध भेसळ असते, ज्यामध्ये थोडी मात्रा घेतल्यानेही आंधळेपणा किंवा मृत्यू होऊ शकणाऱ्या मिथेनॉलचा समावेश असतो.
mt: Drink alcohol responsibly. Alcohol affects everyone differently and knowing your limits is very important. Excessive drinking can lead to long-term health consequences such as liver damage and blindness or death. Drinking bootleg liquor can increase the risk of possible danger. Bootleg spirits may contain methanol, which can lead to blindness or death even in small amounts.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: कॅनल जिल्हा (डच: ग्रॅचटेनगॉर्डेल) हा आम्सटरडॅमच्या बिन्नेस्टॅडच्या सभोवतालचा 17 व्या शतकाचा एक जिल्हा आहे. आपल्या एकमेव सांस्कृतिक आणि ऐतिहासिक मुल्यामुळे हा संपूर्ण जिल्हा युनेस्को जागतिक वारसा स्थान म्हणून ठरला आहे आणि तिथल्या मालमत्तेच्या किमती देशातील सर्वाधिक मधील काही आहेत.
mt: 17th-century Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a neighborhood of Amsterdam surrounding the Binnenstad. Its entire area has been designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site due to its cultural and historical value, and its real estate values are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: फ्नोम क्रोम, सिएम रिपच्या नैऋत्येस १२ किमी वर असणारे डोंगर माथ्यावरील हे मंदिर ९व्या शतकात, राजा यासोवर्मन यांच्या शासनकाळात बांधण्यात आले होते. मंदिराचे अंधारमय वातावरण आणि टोनले सॅप तलावावरील दृश्य हे डोंगरावर चढणे सार्थक ठरवतात. तलावाच्या बोटीच्या सहलीसह पर्यटन ठिकाणाला भेट देणे सोयीस्करपणे एकत्र जोडले जाऊ शकते. मंदिरात प्रवेश करण्यासाठी अंगकोर पासची आवश्यकता आहे जेणेकरून टोन्ली सॅपकडे जात असताना आपला पासपोर्ट सोबत आणण्यास विसरू नका.
mt: 12 km north of Siem Reap, Phnom Krom is a temple on a hilltop built in the 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman. The temple's dark atmosphere and Tonle Sap lake views make the climb worthwhile. The lake's boat ride can be conveniently combined with a visit to the tourist attraction. Entry to the temple requires an Angkor Pass, so don't forget to bring your passport when going to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: अंटार्क्टिका हे पृथ्वीवरील सर्वात थंड ठिकाण आहे आणि दक्षिण ध्रुव देखील याने वेढलेला आहे. पर्यटकांच्या भेटी महागड्या आणि शारीरिक तंदुरुस्तीची मागणी करणाऱ्या, फक्त उन्हाळ्यात नोव्हेंबर-फेब्रुवारीदरम्यान होऊ शकणाऱ्या आणि त्या मुख्यतः पेनिन्सुला, आइसलँड आणि रॉस समुद्रापर्यंतच मर्यादीत आहेत. काही चार डझन बेस मध्ये त्या विभागामध्ये दोन एक हजार कर्मचारी उन्हाळ्यात इथे राहतात; फार थोडे लोक हिवाळ्यापर्यंत राहतात. इनलँड अंटार्क्टिका हे एक निर्जन पठार आहे जे 2-3 km बर्फाने आच्छादित आहे. प्रासंगिक तज्ञांच्या हवाई सहली या पर्वतारोहण किंवा मोठा तळ असलेल्या ध्रुवापर्यंत पोहोचण्यासाठी अंतर्गत भागात जातात.
mt: Antartica is the coldest place on Earth and the South Pole is also wrapped in it. Visits are expensive and physically demanding, limited to the summer months of November-February and mostly restricted to the Peninsula, Island and Ross Sea. There are four dozen bases in that region where two thousand employees live in the summer; few stay through the winter. Inland Antarctica is a barren plateau covered in 2-3 km of ice. Relevant experts' aerial tours of the mountain or large ice cap reach the Pole through the interior.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: पूर्व-आधुनिक वेधशाळा आज सामान्यत: कालबाह्य झाल्या असून संग्रहालये किंवा शैक्षणिक स्थळे म्हणून उरल्या आहेत. त्यांच्या अत्यंत भरभराटीच्या काळात प्रकाशाचे प्रदूषण ही आजच्या काळासारखी समस्या नव्हती, ते सहसा शहरांमध्ये किंवा कॅम्पसमध्ये राहत होते, त्यामुळे आधुनिक काळात बनवलेल्या ठिकाणांपेक्षा तेथे पोहोचणे सोपे आहे. बहुतांश आधुनिक संशोधन दुर्बिणी सुदूर भागांमध्ये वातावरणीय स्थिती अनुकूल असताना प्रचंड सुविधा देतात.
mt: Pre-modern observatories are now usually obsolete, having been converted to museums or educational sites. In their heyday, light pollution was not a problem like it is today, as they were usually located in cities or campsites, making them easier to reach than modern sites, which are often in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions and provide huge facilities.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: ऑकलंड 2 बंदरांच्या मध्ये असल्याने तिथे अनेक समुद्र किनारे आहेत. सर्वात लोकप्रिय किनारे 3 भागांमध्ये आहेत. उत्तरीय तटावरील किनारे (उत्तर हार्बर जिल्ह्यातील) प्रशांत महासागराचे आहेत आणि ते उत्तरेतील लॉंग बे पासून दक्षिणेत डेव्हनपोर्टपर्यंत पसरलेले आहेत. ते सर्व वाळूचे किनारे आहेत आणि पोहोण्यासाठी सुरक्षित, आणि बहुतांश ठिकाणी पोहुतुकावा वृक्षांमुळे मिळणारी सावली आहे. तमाकी ड्राईव्ह समुद्रकिनारे हे वेटमाता बंदरावर आहेत, मध्य ऑकलंड मधील मिशन बे आणि सेंट हेलीयर्स च्या वरच्या बाजारातील उपनगरा मध्ये आहेत. हे काही वेळेस गर्दीचे कौटुंबिक किनारे असून इथे किनाऱ्यालगत दुकानांची एक चांगली मालिका आहे. पोहणे सुरक्षित आहे.
mt: 2 harbours are located in the middle of Auckland, so there are many sea coasts. The most popular coasts are divided into 3 parts. The northern coast (in the North Harbour district) is in the Pacific Ocean and stretches from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are all sandy coasts and safe for swimming, and most of the time there is shade from the pohutukawa trees. The Tamaki Drive sea coast is located in the Waitemata Harbour, in the middle of Auckland, in Mission Bay and in the upper market of St Heliers. This is sometimes a busy family coast and there is a good line of shops next to the coast. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: तुम्ही मुळात एका सामूहिक समाधीस्थळाला भेट देत आहात तसेच, या स्थळाचे जगातील मोठ्या लोकसंख्येसाठी अतुलनिय महत्त्व आहे, हे कृपया लक्षात ठेवा. इथे अजूनही काही पुरूष व स्त्रिया जिवंत आहेत जे त्यांच्या अस्तित्वासाठी झगडत आहेत, तसेच यहूदी आणि गैर-यहूदी सारख्या अनेकांच्या प्रियजनांची हत्या केली गेली किंवा जीवे मारले गेले होते. कृपया साईटकडे ती पात्र असलेल्या सर्व प्रतिष्ठा, गांभीर्य आणि आदराने पहा. होलोकॉस्ट किंवा नाझीविषयी विनोद करू नका. संरचनांवर खुणा किंवा वाक्ये खरडून या स्थळाला विद्रुप करु नका.
mt: You are visiting a collective grave site, and this place has an unparalleled importance for the largest population in the world. There are still some men and women alive who are fighting for their existence, as well as the murder of many Jews and non-Jews alike. Please view this site with all due respect, gravity, and reverence. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or the Nazis. Do not deface structures or write on them to make this place a mockery.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: सहाय्यक भाषा या ज्या लोकांना एकमेकांशी संवाद साधताना त्रास होतो अशा लोकांमधील संभाषणाला मदत करण्यासाठी तयार केलेल्या कृत्रिम किंवा तयार केलेल्या भाषा होत. त्या लिंगुआ फ्रँकासपासून भिन्न आहेत, ज्या नैसर्गिक किंवा हातवाऱ्यांचा उपयोग असलेल्या भाषा आहेत ज्या इतर भाषिकांच्या दरम्यानचे संवादाचे साधन म्हणून एका कारणाने किंवा इतर कारणास्तव प्रबळ बनतात.
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed or engineered languages designed to facilitate communication between people who have difficulty communicating in natural or naturally evolved languages that are dominant as a means of communication between speakers of different languages for some reason or other.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: जर हिवाळ्यात उत्तर बाल्टिक ओलांडत असाल, तर केबिनचे स्थान तपासा, कारण बर्फातून प्रवास करताना जे अत्यंत प्रभावित आहेत त्यांच्यासाठी भयानक गोंधळ करू शकते. सेंट पीटर्सबर्ग क्रुझमध्ये शहरात वेळ घालवण्यास परवानगी आहे. क्रुझच्या प्रवाशांना व्हिसा आवश्यक असण्यामधून वगळण्यात आले आहे (अटी वाचा).
mt: If you're traveling over the North Baltic in winter, check your cabin, because those most affected by the chaos can be terrifying. Visas are waived for cruise passengers in St. Petersburg (read the terms).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: बार्सिलोनाच्या अधिकृत भाषा कॅटालन आणि स्पॅनिश आहेत. सुमारे अर्धे लोक कॅटालन बोलतात, व्यापक संख्येतील लोक ती समजतात, आणि जवळपास प्रत्येकजणे स्पॅनिश जाणतो. तथापि, जवळपास सर्व चिन्हे फक्त कॅटलनमध्ये दर्शवण्यात आली आहेत कारण कायद्याने ही पहिली अधिकृत भाषा म्हणून प्रमाणित केली आहे. तरी देखील, सार्वजनिक वाहतूक आणि इतर सुविधांसाठी स्पॅनिश सुद्धा मोठ्या प्रमाणावर वापरली जाते. मेट्रोमध्ये नियमित उद्घोषणा केवळ कॅटालनमध्ये केल्या जातात, परंतु अनियोजित खंडांची घोषणा स्पॅनिश, इंग्लिश, फ्रेंच, अरेबिक आणि जपानीसह अनेकविध प्रकारच्या भाषांमधून एका स्वयंचलित यंत्रणेद्वारे केल्या जातात.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half the population speaks Catalan, a large number understand it, and almost everyone speaks Spanish. However, almost all signs are only shown in Catalan because it is the first official language recognized by law. Nevertheless, Spanish is also widely used for public transportation and other facilities. Announcements on the metro are made only in Catalan, but announcements of unscheduled stops are made in Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and several other languages by an automated system.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: आज विकसित देशांमध्ये, उत्तम बिछाना आणि नाश्ता पुरवणे हे जणू एका कला प्रकाराप्रमाणे मोठे झाले आहे. अखेरीस, B&B स्पष्टपणे प्रामुख्याने 2 मुख्य गोष्टींवर प्रतिस्पर्धा करतात: बेडिंग आणि ब्रेकफास्ट. त्यानुसार, अशा सर्वोत्तम इमारतींमध्ये 1 द्या ला सर्वात आरामदायक बिछाना, कदाचित एखादी हाताने तयर केलेली गोधडी किंवा एखादा जुन्या काळातील बेड मिळाला तर उत्तम न्याहारीमध्ये प्रदेशातील हंगामी खासियत किंवा यजमानाच्या खास पदार्थाचा समावेश असू शकतो. सेटिंग कदाचित पुरातन फर्निचर, साफ मैदान आणि जलतरण तलाव असलेली ऐतिहासिक जुनी इमारत असेल.
mt: Today, in developed countries, the best bedding and breakfasts have become almost an art form.  Ultimately, the best B&Bs compete on two main things: bedding and breakfast.  So, in the best of these establishments, one day you might find the most comfortable bedding, perhaps a hand-woven rug or an antique bed, and in the best breakfasts you might find the regional specialty or a dish of the host's own making.  The setting might be an historic old building with antique furniture, a clean field and a swimming pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: आज विकसित देशांमध्ये, उत्तम बिछाना आणि नाश्ता पुरवणे हे जणू एका कला प्रकाराप्रमाणे मोठे झाले आहे. अखेरीस, B&B स्पष्टपणे प्रामुख्याने 2 मुख्य गोष्टींवर प्रतिस्पर्धा करतात: बेडिंग आणि ब्रेकफास्ट. त्यानुसार, अशा सर्वोत्तम इमारतींमध्ये 1 द्या ला सर्वात आरामदायक बिछाना, कदाचित एखादी हाताने तयर केलेली गोधडी किंवा एखादा जुन्या काळातील बेड मिळाला तर उत्तम न्याहारीमध्ये प्रदेशातील हंगामी खासियत किंवा यजमानाच्या खास पदार्थाचा समावेश असू शकतो. सेटिंग कदाचित पुरातन फर्निचर, साफ मैदान आणि जलतरण तलाव असलेली ऐतिहासिक जुनी इमारत असेल.

src: चीनमधील बीजिंग शहर 2022 मध्ये ऑलिम्पिक हिवाळी खेळांचे यजमान शहर असेल, ज्यामुळे हे उन्हाळी आणि हिवाळी ऑलिंपिक दोन्ही खेळांचे आयोजन करणारे पहिलेच शहर होईल. बीजिंग उद्घाटन व समारोप समारंभ तसेच इनडोर आईस इव्हेंट्सचे आयोजन करेल. इतर स्कीईंग कार्यक्रम हे झान्ग्जीयाकु क्षेत्रामधील तैझीचेंग येथे होतील जे बीजिंग पासून 220 किमी (140 मैल) अंतरावर आहे.
mt: 2022 Winter Olympics will be held in Beijing, China, which will be the first city to host both Winter and Summer Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies as well as the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be held in the Zhangjiakou region at the Taizicheng site, which is 220 km (140 mi) away from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: चीनमधील बीजिंग शहर 2022 मध्ये ऑलिम्पिक हिवाळी खेळांचे यजमान शहर असेल, ज्यामुळे हे उन्हाळी आणि हिवाळी ऑलिंपिक दोन्ही खेळांचे आयोजन करणारे पहिलेच शहर होईल. बीजिंग उद्घाटन व समारोप समारंभ तसेच इनडोर आईस इव्हेंट्सचे आयोजन करेल. इतर स्कीईंग कार्यक्रम हे झान्ग्जीयाकु क्षेत्रामधील तैझीचेंग येथे होतील जे बीजिंग पासून 220 किमी (140 मैल) अंतरावर आहे.
mt: 2022 Winter Olympics will be held in Beijing, China, which will be the first city to host both Winter and Summer Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies as well as the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be held in the Zhangjiakou region at the Taizicheng site, which is 220 km (140 mi) away from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: बर्ड फ्लू किंवा औपचारिकरित्या एव्हीयन इन्फ्लूएन्झा पक्षी आणि सस्तन प्राणी दोहोंनाही संसर्ग करू शकतो. मानवामध्ये एक हजार पेक्षा प्रकरणे आजपर्यंत नोंदवली गेली आहेत, परंतु त्यातील प्राणघातक आहेत. यामध्ये पोल्ट्रीमध्ये काम करणाऱ्या लोकांचा सहभाग असला तरी पक्षीनिरीक्षकांनाही थोडा धोका आहे.
mt: Bird flu or officially avian influenza can infect both birds and mammals. There have been over a thousand human cases reported to date, but only a few have been fatal. However, there is some risk to poultry inspectors as well.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: बर्ड फ्लू किंवा औपचारिकरित्या एव्हीयन इन्फ्लूएन्झा पक्षी आणि सस्तन प्राणी दोहोंनाही संसर्ग करू शकतो. मानवामध्ये एक हजार पेक्षा प्रकरणे आजपर्यंत नोंदवली गेली आहेत, परंतु त्यातील प्राणघातक आहेत. यामध्ये पोल्ट्रीमध्ये काम करणाऱ्या लोकांचा सहभाग असला तरी पक्षीनिरीक्षकांनाही थोडा धोका आहे.
mt: Bird flu or officially avian influenza can infect both birds and mammals. There have been over a thousand human cases reported to date, but only a few have been fatal. However, there is some risk to poultry inspectors as well.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: काळा समुद्र आणि कॅप्सियन समुद्र जिंकण्यासाठी वायकिंग्जनी रशियन जलमार्गांचा वापर केला. यापैकी काही मार्ग अद्याप वापरता येतात. विशेष परवान्यांसाठी संभाव्य गरज तपासून पाहा, जी मिळणे अवघड असते. पांढरा समुद्र - बाल्टिक कालवा आर्क्टिक महासागरास बाल्टिक समुद्राशी ओनेगातलाव, लाडोगा तलाव आणि सेंट पीटर्सबर्ग  बहुतांश नद्या आणि तलावाद्वारे जोडला गेलेला आहे. ओनेगा तलाव हा देखील वोल्गाशी जोडला गेलेला आहे, म्हणून रशिया मधून कास्पियन समुद्र कडून येणे अद्याप ही शक्य आहे.
mt: The Vikings used Russian waterways to conquer the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Some of these routes are still in use. The White Sea - Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean with the Baltic Sea via the Onega Lake, Ladoga Lake and Saint Petersburg. Most rivers and lakes are connected with the Volga, so it is still possible to come from Russia through the Caspian Sea.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: विमान, जहाज किंवा दुसऱ्या एखाद्या वाहनातून उतरताना साधारणपणे इमिग्रेशन चेकपॉईंट हा पहिला थांबा असतो. काही सीमापार ट्रेन मध्ये तपासणी धावत्या ट्रेन मध्ये केली जाते आणि तुम्ही जर अशा 1 ट्रेन मध्ये स्वार असाल तर तुमच्या कडे वैध ओळखपत्र हवे. रात्रीच्या स्लीपर ट्रेन्समध्ये तुमच्या झोपेत अडथळा येऊ नये याकरिता कंडक्टरद्वारे पासपोर्ट गोळा केले जाऊ शकतात.
mt: 1. The first stop is usually the immigration checkpoint when disembarking from a plane, ship or other vehicle. Some border train checks are done on moving trains and if you are on such a train, you will need a valid identification document. Passports can be collected by conductors on overnight sleeper trains to avoid disruptions to your sleep.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: विमान, जहाज किंवा दुसऱ्या एखाद्या वाहनातून उतरताना साधारणपणे इमिग्रेशन चेकपॉईंट हा पहिला थांबा असतो. काही सीमापार ट्रेन मध्ये तपासणी धावत्या ट्रेन मध्ये केली जाते आणि तुम्ही जर अशा 1 ट्रेन मध्ये स्वार असाल तर तुमच्या कडे वैध ओळखपत्र हवे. रात्रीच्या स्लीपर ट्रेन्समध्ये तुमच्या झोपेत अडथळा येऊ नये याकरिता कंडक्टरद्वारे पासपोर्ट गोळा केले जाऊ शकतात.
mt: 1. The first stop is usually the immigration checkpoint when disembarking from a plane, ship or other vehicle. Some border train checks are done on moving trains and if you are on such a train, you will need a valid identification document. Passports can be collected by conductors on overnight sleeper trains to avoid disruptions to your sleep.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "सिंगापूर सामान्यतः अत्यंत सुरक्षित आणि वाहतुकीसाठी खूप सोपे ठिकाण आहे आणि तुम्ही आल्यानंतर जवळपास सर्वकाही खरेदी करू शकता. ""मात्र, विषुवतृत्ताच्या उत्तरेकडे """"उच्च उष्ण कटिबंधा""""मध्ये ठेवल्यामुळे तुम्हाला उष्णता (कायम) आणि प्रखर सूर्य (जेव्हा आकाश निरभ्र असते, खूप क्वचित) या दोन्हीशीही जुळवून घ्यावे लागते."""
mt: "Singapore is generally very safe and easy to get around, and you can buy almost anything after you arrive.  However, being in the Northern Hemisphere """"tropics"""" means you have to get used to the heat (constant) and intense sun (when the sky is clear, very rarely)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: जर्मन पेस्ट्रीज खूप चांगल्या आहेत आणि त्यांच्या दक्षिणेकडील शेजारी ऑस्ट्रियाप्रमाणेच बावरियामध्ये बर्‍याच समृध्द आणि वैविध्यपूर्ण आहेत. सफरचंद वर्षभर उपलब्ध असल्याने त्याच्या फ्रुट पेस्ट्रीज सामान्य असतात, तसेच पेस्ट्रीजमध्ये चेरी आणि प्लम्स हे उन्हाळ्यात दिसतात. अनेक जर्मनीमध्ये बेक केलेल्या वस्तूंमध्ये बदाम, हेझलनट्स आणि इतर ट्री नट्स देखील असतात. लोकप्रिय केक्सची मजा विशेषतः एक कप स्ट्रॉंग कॉफीसह चांगल्याप्रकारे घेता येते. तुम्हाला लहान पण चांगल्या प्रतीच्या पेस्ट्री खायच्या असल्यास, प्रदेशावर अवलंबून बर्लिनर, फंकूहन किंवा क्राफन नावाचे पदार्थ खाऊन पाहा.
mt: German pastries are very good and like their southern neighbor Austria, Bavaria is very fertile and diverse. Fruits are available year round so fruit pastries are common, as are cherry and plum pastries in the summer. Many German baked goods also contain almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Enjoying a cup of strong coffee with a small but good quality pastry is a popular treat. If you prefer small but good quality pastries, try Berliner, Funnkueh or Krafne depending on the region.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: जर तुम्हाला हे जग स्वतः पहायचे असेल, गरज असेल, जीवनशैली किंवा आव्हान म्हणून पहायचे असेल तर त्यासाठी काही मार्ग आहेत. मुख्यत: त्याचे दोन प्रकार आहेत: एकतर तुम्ही काम करताना प्रवास करा किंवा प्रयत्न करा आणि तुमचे खर्च मर्यादित ठेवा. हा लेख दुसऱ्या प्रकारावर भाष्य करतो. खर्च कमी करण्यासाठी आराम, वेळ याचा त्याग करण्यास इच्छुक आहेत अशा लोकांनी किमान बजेट प्रवास विचारात घ्यावा. हा सल्ला असा गृहित धरतो की प्रवासी बेकायदेशीर बाजारामध्ये चोरी, अनाचार यात भाग घेत नाहीत, भीक मागत नाहीत किंवा स्वतःच्या फायद्यासाठी इतर लोकांचे शोषण करत नाहीत.
mt: If you want to see this world, if you need to see it, if you want to see it as a lifestyle or as a challenge, there are some ways. Mainly there are two types: either you travel while you work or you try and keep your expenses limited. This article is about the second type. Those who are willing to sacrifice rest, time to keep their expenses minimum, should at least consider budget travel. This advice assumes that travelers do not participate in illegal markets, do not commit crimes, do not beg, and do not exploit others for their own benefit.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: पॉइंट मॅरिअन आणि फेअरमॉंट मधील क्षेत्र, विलग असणाऱ्या वन्यक्षेत्रामधून वारंवार जाणाऱ्या बफेलो-पिट्सबर्ग हायवेवर आव्हानात्मक परिस्थिती निर्माण करते. तुम्हाला आपल्याला देशातील रस्त्यावर वाहन चालवण्याची सवय नसल्यास, तुमच्याबद्दलची माहिती स्पष्ट करा: उंच ग्रेड, अरुंद गल्ल्या आणि तीव्र नागमोडी मार्ग. ठरवलेल्या वेगमर्यादा मागील आणि त्यानंतरच्या विभागांपेक्षा लक्षणीय प्रमाणात कमी आहेत — सामान्यतः ३५-४० मीटर प्रति तास (५६-६४ किमी/तास) — आणि इतर वेळपेक्षा त्याचे काटेकोरपणे पालन करणे अधिक महत्त्वाचे आहे. उत्सुकतेने सांगायचे असेल तर मोबाईल फोन सेवा ही मार्गाच्या इतर भागाच्या तुलनेत खूपच मजबूत आहे, उदाहरणार्थ. पेनसिल्व्हेनिया वाइल्ड्स.
mt: The Point Marion and Fairmont areas, and the Buffalo-Pittsburgh highway, which runs through the isolated Buffalo National Forest, can be challenging. If you are not used to driving on the roads in the country, make sure to let others know: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves. Speed limits are significantly lower than in the rear and front sections — usually 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and it is more important to stick to them than in other times. If you are curious, the mobile phone service is much stronger than in other parts of the road, for example. Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: कॅनिओनिंग (किंवा: कॅन्योनेरिंग) हे दरीच्या तळाशी जाणे आहे, जे ठिकाण एकतर कोरडे किंवा पाण्याने भरलेले आहे. कॅन्यनिंगमध्ये पोहणे, चढणे आणि उड्या मारणे यांचा समावेश आहे -- पण यासाठी (उदाहरणार्थ रॉक क्लायंबिंग, स्कूबा डायव्हिंग किंवा आलपाईन स्किंग यांच्या तुलनेने) प्रशिक्षण किंवा शारीरिक घडणीची गरज कमी आहे.
mt: Canyoneering is the act of descending into canyons, which may be either dry or filled with water. It includes swimming, climbing, and rappelling -- but requires less training and physical fitness than activities like rock climbing, scuba diving, or alpine skiing.
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: कॅनिओनिंग (किंवा: कॅन्योनेरिंग) हे दरीच्या तळाशी जाणे आहे, जे ठिकाण एकतर कोरडे किंवा पाण्याने भरलेले आहे. कॅन्यनिंगमध्ये पोहणे, चढणे आणि उड्या मारणे यांचा समावेश आहे -- पण यासाठी (उदाहरणार्थ रॉक क्लायंबिंग, स्कूबा डायव्हिंग किंवा आलपाईन स्किंग यांच्या तुलनेने) प्रशिक्षण किंवा शारीरिक घडणीची गरज कमी आहे.

src: "तुमच्या स्वत:च्या कारमध्ये बसणे आणि दूरच्या प्रवासासाठी जायला निघणे यास साधेपणाचे एक अंतर्निहित आवाहन असते. अधिक मोठ्या वाहनांच्या तुलनेत, आपण बहुधा आपली कार चालवण्यात यापूर्वीच सरावलेले आहात आणि त्याच्या मर्यादा जाणता. एखाद्या खाजगी मालमत्तेवर किंवा एखाद्या गावात  कोणत्याही आकाराचा तंबू उभारणे अगदी सहज कोणाचेही अवांछित लक्ष वेधून घेऊ शकते. ""थोडक्यात, रस्त्यावरील प्रवासाकरिता तुमची कार वापरणे एक मस्त मार्ग आहे परंतु """"कँप"""" करण्याचा हा क्वचितच एक मार्ग आहे. "" तुमच्याकडे मोठी मिनीव्हॅन, SUV, सेडान किंवा स्टेशन वॅगन असून त्यामध्ये खाली जागा असल्यास कार कॅम्पिंग शक्य आहे."
mt: "Your own car and the journey to a distant place is a simple underlying invitation. You are probably already familiar with driving your car and its limitations. Erecting a tent on a private property or in a village can attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car for a road trip is a great way but ""camping"" is a rare way. If you have a large minivan, SUV, sedan or station wagon and there is space below, car camping is possible."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: "तुमच्या स्वत:च्या कारमध्ये बसणे आणि दूरच्या प्रवासासाठी जायला निघणे यास साधेपणाचे एक अंतर्निहित आवाहन असते. अधिक मोठ्या वाहनांच्या तुलनेत, आपण बहुधा आपली कार चालवण्यात यापूर्वीच सरावलेले आहात आणि त्याच्या मर्यादा जाणता. एखाद्या खाजगी मालमत्तेवर किंवा एखाद्या गावात  कोणत्याही आकाराचा तंबू उभारणे अगदी सहज कोणाचेही अवांछित लक्ष वेधून घेऊ शकते. ""थोडक्यात, रस्त्यावरील प्रवासाकरिता तुमची कार वापरणे एक मस्त मार्ग आहे परंतु """"कँप"""" करण्याचा हा क्वचितच एक मार्ग आहे. "" तुमच्याकडे मोठी मिनीव्हॅन, SUV, सेडान किंवा स्टेशन वॅगन असून त्यामध्ये खाली जागा असल्यास कार कॅम्पिंग शक्य आहे."
mt: "Your own car and the journey to a distant place is a simple underlying invitation. You are probably already familiar with driving your car and its limitations. Erecting a tent on a private property or in a village can attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car for a road trip is a great way but ""camping"" is a rare way. If you have a large minivan, SUV, sedan or station wagon and there is space below, car camping is possible."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: कॅसाब्लांकाचे आधुनिक शहर हे बर्बर मासेमाऱ्याने इसवीसन पूर्व 10 व्या शतकात वसवले आणि फिनिशियन, रोमन आणि मेरेनीद्स यांच्याकडून एक व्यूहरचनात्मक बंदर अन्फा म्हणून वापरले जात होते. 1755 मध्ये भूकंप झाल्यानंतर फक्त रिकामे सोडण्यासाठी पोर्तुगीजांनी ते नष्ट केले आणि कॅसा ब्रान्का या नावाने  पुन्हा बांधले. मोरोक्कन सुलतानाने दारू-इ-बड्या या नावाने शहर पुन्हा वसवले आणि तिथे आपले व्यापारी तळ तयार केलेल्या स्पॅनिश व्यापाऱ्यांनी त्याला कासाब्लँका असे नाव दिले. कॅसाब्लांका ही संपूर्ण मोरोक्कोमधील खरेदी करण्याच्या सर्वात कमी मनोरंजक जागांपैकी 1 आहे. जुन्या मेडिनाच्या आसपास टॅगिन (उत्तर अमेरिकेतील स्टू), मातीची भांडी, चामड्याच्या वस्तू, हुक्के आणि असंख्य शोभिवंत वस्तुंचा खजिना अशा पारंपरिक मोरक्कन वस्तुंची विक्री करणारी ठिकाणे शोधणे सोपे आहे, परंतु हे सर्व फक्त पर्यटकांसाठी आहे.
mt: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber pirates in the 10th century and used as a trading port by the Phoenicians, Romans and Moors as Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it in 1755 after an earthquake, rebuilt it as Casa Branca, and the Moroccan Sultan re-founded it as Daru-l-Baida, which the Spanish traders renamed Casablanca. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to buy in all of Morocco. The old medina, around the ancient Tign (like the Stu in North America), clay pots, leather goods, hookahs and countless other Moroccan souvenirs are easy to find, but all this is for tourists only.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: सिंट्राचे रोमँटिक आणि मोहक शहर हे उत्तरेकडे व सहज पोहोचता येऊ शकणारे आहे तसेच लॉर्ड बायरनने रेकॉर्ड केलेल्या त्याच्या वैभवाच्या भव्यतेच्या वर्णनानंतर हे परदेशी लोकांमध्ये देखील प्रसिद्ध झाले आहे. स्कॉटरब बस ४०३ नियमितपणे सिन्ट्राला जाते, काबो दा रोका येथे थांबते. तसेच उत्तरेकडील अवर लेडी ऑफ फातिमा (तीर्थस्थान), जगभरात प्रसिद्ध मारियन अँपरिशन्स ठिकाण असेलेल्या या उत्कृष्ट अभयारण्याला भेट द्या.
mt: The romantic and charming city of Sintra is easily accessible to the north and is also well known to foreigners after Lord Byron's record of its splendor. The 403 bus to Sintra runs regularly, stopping at Cabo da Roca, where the famous Marian apparitions at this excellent sanctuary will be found.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: १९९४ मध्ये वांशिकदृष्ट्या अझरबैजन आर्मेनियन नागोर्नो-कराबाख प्रदेशाने अझेरिसविरुद्ध युद्ध छेडले. आर्मेनियन समर्थनाच्या मदतीने एक नवीन प्रजासत्ताक तयार केले गेले. तथापि, कोणतेही स्थापित राष्ट्र - केवळ आर्मेनिया देखील नाही - अधिकृतपणे यास मान्यता देते. आर्मेनिया आणि अझरबैजान यांच्यातील संबध क्षेत्रातील राजनैतिक विधानांमुळे खराबच राहिलेले आहेत.
mt: 1994 saw the Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan, ethnically Armenian, declare war on Azerbaijan. A new republic was established with the support of Armenia. However, no established state - not even Armenia itself - officially recognizes this. Political relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan have been strained by the region's political status.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: १९९४ मध्ये वांशिकदृष्ट्या अझरबैजन आर्मेनियन नागोर्नो-कराबाख प्रदेशाने अझेरिसविरुद्ध युद्ध छेडले. आर्मेनियन समर्थनाच्या मदतीने एक नवीन प्रजासत्ताक तयार केले गेले. तथापि, कोणतेही स्थापित राष्ट्र - केवळ आर्मेनिया देखील नाही - अधिकृतपणे यास मान्यता देते. आर्मेनिया आणि अझरबैजान यांच्यातील संबध क्षेत्रातील राजनैतिक विधानांमुळे खराबच राहिलेले आहेत.

src: नॉर्थ कॅरोलिना, चार्लोटकडील महत्त्वाची बाब म्हणजे त्याकडे कुटुंबांकरिता उच्च-गुणवत्तेचे पर्याय उपलब्ध आहेत. अन्य भागातील निवास बरेचदा इथे येण्यासाठी कौटुंबिक-मित्रता हे एक प्रमुख कारण सांगतात आणि आगंतुकांना लहान मुलांसोबत आनंद घेण्यासाठी शहर सोयीचं असल्याचा अनुभव येतो. गेल्या २० वर्षांमध्ये, अपटाउन शार्लोटमधील लहान मुलांसाठी असलेल्या पर्यायांमध्ये झपाट्याने वाढ झाली आहे. शार्लोट मध्ये सहसा कुटुंबांकडून टॅक्सीचा वापर केला जात नाही, तरी देखील काही परिस्थिती मध्ये त्यांचा काही उपयोग होऊ शकतो. दोनपेक्षा अधिक प्रवासी घेतल्यास अतिरिक्त शुल्क आकारले जाते, त्यामुळे हा पर्याय गरजेपेक्षा अधिक महागडा ठरू शकतो.
mt: North Carolina, Charlotte is a major draw for families because of its high quality of life. Many visitors cite family-friendliness as a reason to come to the city and enjoy the city with their children. Over the past 20 years, the options for children in Charlotte have exploded. In Charlotte, families rarely use taxis, but in some situations they can be useful. Additional fees are charged for more than two passengers, making this option more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: 16 व्या शतकात स्पॅनिश लोक येण्यापूर्वी, उत्तर चिली इनका राज्यवटीखाली होती तर मूळ व दक्षिणेकडील चिली येथे स्वदेशी आराउकेनिअन्स (मापुचे) रहात होते. मापुचे देखील अंतिम स्वतंत्र अमेरिकी मूळनिवासी समूहांपैकी एक होते, जे चिली स्वतंत्र होईपर्यंत स्पॅनिश-भाषिक सत्तेमध्ये पूर्णपणे सामावले गेले नव्हते. 1810 मध्ये चिलीने स्वातंत्र्य घोषित केले असले तरीही (नेपोलियनच्या युद्धांदरम्यान, स्पेन काही वर्षांपासून कार्यरत केंद्र सरकारविना राहिल्याने), 1818 पर्यंत स्पॅनिशवर निर्णायक विजय मिळू शकला नाही.
mt: 16th century before the Spanish arrived, northern Chile was under Inca rule, while the Mapuches lived in the south. The Mapuches were also one of the last fully independent indigenous groups of the Americas, not being fully incorporated into the Spanish-speaking state until Chile declared independence in 1810 (although Spain was without a functioning central government for several years due to the Napoleonic Wars).
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

The Mapuches were also one of the last fully independent indigenous groups of the Americas, not being fully incorporated into the Spanish-speaking state until Chile declared independence in 1810 (although Spain was without a functioning central government for several years due to the Napoleonic Wars).
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: सिनेक टेर, म्हणजे पाच भूभाग, लिगुरियाच्या इटालियन प्रदेशामध्ये रिओमाग्गीओर, मॅनरोला, कॉर्निगलिया, वेर्नाझा आणि मॉन्टरोझो ही किनारपट्टीलगतची पाच लहान गावे आहेत. त्यांची UNESCO जागतिक वारसा यादीत नोंद झाली आहे. समुद्रासमोर असलेल्या उंच कड्यांवरील खडकाळ आणि खडबडीत भूभागावर शतकानुशतके लोकांनी काळीपूर्वक गच्च्या बांधल्या आहेत. त्याच्या आकर्षकतेचा भाग हा कमी दिसण्यात येणारा कॉर्पोरेटचा विकास आहे. रस्ते, रेल्वे आणि बोटी गावांना जोडतात, आणि तिथे कार्समधून बाहेरुन जाता येत नाही.
mt: Cinque Terre, meaning "Five Lands", is a coastal area in the Liguria region of northwestern Italy. The five villages are Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza, and Monterosso al Mare. They are located on the coast of the Ligurian Sea and are connected by the Via dell'Amore ("Lover's Lane") walking trail. The area is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: निसरडे रस्ते, फरसबंदी (फूटपाथ) आणि मुख्यतः पायऱ्या ही हिवाळ्यात अपघात होण्याची सर्वात सामान्य कारणे आहेत. कमीतकमी, तुम्हाला योग्य तळवे असलेल्या बुटांची गरज आहे. उन्हाळ्यात वापरले जाणारे बूट सामान्यतः बर्फ आणि हिमावर घसरतात, काही हिवाळी बूटही वापरण्यासाठी योग्य नसतात. नमुना पुरेसा खोल, 5 मिमी (1/5 इंच) किंवा अधिक असावा आणि थंड तापमानात सामग्री पुरेशी मऊ असावी. काही बूट्समध्ये स्टड असतात तसेच निसरड्या परिस्थितीत वापरण्यासाठी स्टड केलेली अॅड-ऑन उपकरणे असतात, जी बहुतांश शूज आणि बूट्ससाठी, हिल्स किंवा हिल्स आणि सोलसाठी योग्य असतात. हील्स कमी आणि रुंद असाव्यात. ट्रॅक्शन सुधारण्यासाठी बहुतांश वेळा रस्त्यांवर किंवा मार्गांवर वाळू, रेती किंवा मीठ (कॅल्शियम क्लोराईड) विखुरलेले असते.
mt: 1. Icy roads, sidewalks and stairs are the most common causes of winter accidents. At least, you need proper footwear with good treads. Winter boots used in summer tend to slip on ice and snow, and some winter boots are not suitable for use in winter. The sole should be thick enough, at least 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material should be soft enough at cold temperatures. Some boots have studs, and there are add-on devices for shoes and boots, which are usually suitable for hills or hills and soles, most of the time roads or paths are sprinkled with sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride).
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: "कूक बेटे हा न्यूझीलंड शी मुक्त सहसंबध असणारा एक बेटांचा देश आहे, जो पॉलीनेशिया मध्ये, दक्षिण प्रशांत महासागराच्या मध्यभागी स्थित आहे. हा एक द्वीपसमूह आहे जो 2 महासागरांतील 15 बेटांमध्ये 2.2 दशलक्षकिमीपर्यंत पसरला आहे. ""हवाई प्रमाणेच वेळ क्षेत्र असणारी ती  बेटे काही वेळा """" हवाई आधिपत्या खालील"""" असल्यासारखी समजली जातात. "" जरी लहान असले तरी, सर्व मोठे पर्यटक हॉटेल्स आणि इतर विकासाशिवाय असलेले राज्य हे हवाईच्या काही वृद्ध पर्यटकांना भेट देतात कूक आयलंडवर कोणतीही शहरे नाहीत पण ती १५ वेगवेगळ्या आयलंडने बनलेली आहेत. त्यातील रारोतोंगा आणि ऐतुताकी ही मुख्य होत."
mt: "Cook Islands is a New Zealand-associated state in free association with New Zealand in the southern Pacific Ocean, which comprises 15 islands in the Cook Islands group of Polynesia, and New Zealand's Ross Dependency in Antarctica. It is self-governing, its three islands being in free association with New Zealand. It has been in free association with New Zealand since 1965 and became a full member of the Commonwealth of Nations in 1988. In 1900, the Cook Islands were annexed by the United Kingdom and were administered by New Zealand until 1964 when the inhabitants chose to separate from New Zealand. In 1965, the Cook Islands became a state in free association with New Zealand. As a result, the Cook Islands is in charge of its own affairs in all respects except foreign affairs and defence. It has been an active member of the Pacific Community since 1983. The Cook Islands' head of state is Queen Elizabeth II, and the head of government is the Prime Minister, Henry Puna. New Zealand is the only state to have a Association of States with the Cook Islands. The Cook Islands have become known as the "Christmas Island" because they are often mistaken for the Australian Christmas Island, which is part of the state of Western Australia. The Cook Islands are also often confused with the Hawaiian island of Kauai, which is also known as the "Garden Island". The Cook Islands are also often confused with the Hawaiian island of Kauai, which is also known as the "Garden Island". The Cook Islands are also often confused with the Hawaiian island of Kauai, which is also known as the "Garden Island". The Cook Islands are also often confused with the Hawaiian island of Kauai, which is also known as the "Garden Island". The Cook Islands are also often confused with the Hawaiian island
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: परमिट्स अगोदरच आरक्षित करणे आवश्यक असते. तुम्हाला सिरेना येथे रात्रभर मुक्काम करण्यासाठी परमिट आवश्यक असते. सिरेना हे एकमेव रेंजर स्टेशन आहे जे शिबिराव्यतिरिक्त वसतिगृह आणि गरम भोजनाची सुविधा देते. ला लिओना, सॅन पेड्रिलो आणि लॉस पॅटोस केवळ शिबिराची सुविधा देतात व कोणतीही भोजन सेवा देत नाहीत. पेर्टो जिमेनेझमधील रेंजर स्टेशनवर पार्कचा परवाना मिळवणे शक्य आहे, पण ते क्रेडीट कार्ड स्वीकारत नाहीत. पार्क सेवा (MINAE) अपेक्षित आगमनाच्या एका महिन्यापेक्षा अधिक पार्क परवाने जरी करत नाही. कॅफेनेत एल सोल 30 अमेरिकन $  शुल्कामध्ये  आरक्षण सेवा देऊ करते किंवा 1 दिवसाच्या पास साठी 10 $ ; तपशील कॉर्कॉवाडो पानावर आहेत.
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. You will need a permit to camp overnight at Sirena, the only ranger station that offers dormitory-style lodging and hot meals. La Leon, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos only offer camping and do not offer any food service. A permit for the ranger station at Perito Gimenéz is possible, but they do not accept credit cards. The park service (MINAE) does not expect to issue park permits more than a month in advance. Cafetel El Sol charges $30 for reservation service or $10 for a one-day pass; details are on the corkboard.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: स्कीद्वारे बॅकपॅकिंग: या क्रियेस बॅककंट्री स्की, स्की टूरिंग किंवा स्की हायकिंग असेही म्हणतात. हे संबंधित आहे परंतु सामान्यत: अल्पाइन स्टाईल स्की टूरिंग किंवा पर्वतारोहणात  यांचा समावेश नसतो, नंतर लोकांनी उतार असलेल्या प्रदेशात स्कीइंग केले तसेच यासाठी जास्त स्किफर स्की आणि बूट आवश्यक असतात. एखाद्या हायकिंग मार्गाप्रमाणे स्कीइंग मार्गाचा विचार करा. चांगल्या परिस्थितीत तुम्ही चालण्यापेक्षा काही अंतर अधिक पार करण्यास सक्षम असाल - परंतु केवळ क्वचितच तुम्हाला तयार केलेल्या ट्रॅक्समध्ये भारी बॅकपॅकशिवाय क्रॉस कंट्री स्कीइंगची गती मिळेल.
mt: Backcountry skiing: This is related but not usually included in alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, where people ski down the area they have ascended, and requires more skis and boots than a normal ski run. Consider a hiking trail as a ski run. In good conditions you can go faster than you can walk - but only rarely will you get the speed of a prepared track without heavy backcountry skiing.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: पुन्हा प्रवेशाचा धक्का संस्कृतीच्या धक्क्यापेक्षा लवकर येतो (हनीमूनचा टप्पा कमी असतो), जास्त काळ टिकतो आणि अधिक गंभीर असू शकतो. प्रवासी ज्यांना नव्या संस्कृतीशी जुळवून सहज घेता आले त्यांना कधी तरी त्यांच्या स्थानिक संस्कृतीशी पुन्हा जुळवून घेणे अवघड होऊ लागते. परदेशात राहून घरी परतताना, तुम्ही नवीन संस्कृतीशी जुळवून घेतलेले असते आणि तुमच्या घरच्या संस्कृतीतील काही सवयी विसरलेल्या असतात. तुम्ही जेव्हा पहिल्यांदा परदेशी गेला होता तेव्हा लोक कदाचित सहनशील आणि समजूतदार असतील, हे जाणून की नव्या देशात प्रवाशांनी अनुकूलन करण्यास वेळ लागतो. घरी परतणाऱ्या प्रवाशांसाठी संयम आणि समजूतदारपणादेखील आवश्यक असतो हे लोकांना कदाचित समजत नाही.
mt: Reentry shock comes sooner than culture shock (the honeymoon phase is shorter), lasts longer, and is more severe. People who have easily assimilated into a new culture will find it difficult to re-assimilate into their native culture. When you first went abroad, people may have been tolerant and understanding, knowing that it takes time for travelers to acclimate. Returning travelers need patience and understanding as well, which people may not be aware of.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: मूस (ज्याला एल्क असेही म्हणतात) मुळात आक्रमक नसतात पण त्यांना धोका जाणवल्यास ते स्वत:चे रक्षण करतात. जेव्हा लोकांना मूस धोकादायक वाटत नाही तेव्हा ते त्याच्या खूप जवळ जातात आणि स्वत:ला धोक्यात घालतात.
mt: Moose (also known as elk) are not naturally aggressive, but they will defend themselves if they feel threatened. When people don't feel threatened by moose, they get very close to them and put themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: मूस (ज्याला एल्क असेही म्हणतात) मुळात आक्रमक नसतात पण त्यांना धोका जाणवल्यास ते स्वत:चे रक्षण करतात. जेव्हा लोकांना मूस धोकादायक वाटत नाही तेव्हा ते त्याच्या खूप जवळ जातात आणि स्वत:ला धोक्यात घालतात.

ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: दिवसाच्या उष्णतेमध्ये, प्रवाशांना मृगजळाचा अनुभव येऊ शकतो, जे पाणी असल्याचा भास निर्माण करतात (किंवा इतर वस्तू). प्रवाशाने मृगजळामागे जाऊन आपली अमूल्य ताकद आणि उर्वरित पाणी वाया घालवणे धोकादायक असू शकते. वाळवंटातील सर्वाधिक उष्ण प्रदेश देखील रात्री अत्यंत थंड होऊ शकतो. उबदार कपड्यांशिवाय हायपोथर्मिया हा वास्तविक धोका आहे.
mt: In the heat of the day, passengers may experience mirages, which can create the illusion of water (or other objects). Passengers should not venture into mirages, as they can waste their precious water and other resources. The hottest regions of the desert can also be extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real danger without warm clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: द डोमिनिकन रिपब्लिक (स्पॅनिशः रिपब्लिका डोमिनीकाना) एक कॅरिबियन देश आहे जो हिस्पानिओलाच्या बेटाचा पूर्वेकडील अर्धा भाग व्यापतो, जो हैतीसोबत सामायिक आहे हा देश पांढरेशुभ्र वाळूंचे किनारे आणि पर्वताच्या लँडस्केपशिवाय अमेरिकेतील सर्वात जुन्या युरोपियन शहराचे माहेरघर असून सध्या हा सॅंटो डोमिंगोचा भाग आहे. या बेटावर प्रथम तैनो आणि कॅरीब्स राहण्यास आले. कॅरीब्स हे आरावाकन पळणारे लोक होते जे 10,000 इ.स.पु. आले होते. युरोपीय शोधप्रवासी आल्याच्या काही वर्षातच, तैनोंची लोकसंख्या स्पॅनिश आक्रमणकर्त्यांकडून मोठ्या प्रमाणात कमी केली गेली. 1492 आणि 1498 च्या दरम्यान फ्रे बार्टोलोमी डे लास कॅसॅस (इंडीजचा तह) वर आधारित स्पॅनिश विजेत्यांनी सुमारे 100,000 टॅनोसना मारले.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean nation that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. The country's capital and largest city is Santo Domingo. The territory was first inhabited by the Taíno people, an Arawakan-speaking group who moved in the Bahamas from the Orinoco delta as early as the 13th century. Beginning in 1492, the Spanish gradually explored and settled the island, and it became a springboard for further Spanish conquest throughout the Caribbean and claims to the mainland of the New World. The territory was called La Isla Española (Hispaniola) and was the first New World territory claimed by the Spanish Crown. The island became the center of Spanish trade and a hub of its overseas commerce, with the port of Santo Domingo being the chief city of the Spanish Empire. The native Taíno were almost completely wiped out due to the actions of the colonists during the early years of Spanish rule and their numbers had declined from 250,000 in 1492 to 500 by 1496. The native population was later replaced by an influx of African slaves, who were brought to Hispaniola to replace the native population and to work in the island's lucrative sugar industry.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "डाउनहिल स्नोस्पोर्ट्स, ज्यामध्ये स्कीइंग आणि स्नोबोर्डिंगचा समावेश आहे, जे स्की किंवा तुमच्या पायाला जोडलेल्या स्नोबोर्डसह बर्फाच्छादित भूभागावर खालील दिशेने स्लाइडिंग करण्याचे लोकप्रिय खेळ समाविष्ट आहेत. ""स्कीइंग हा अनेक उत्साही लोकांसह करावयाचा मुख्य प्रवास विषयक उपक्रम आहे, ज्यास कधीकधी """"स्की बम्स,"""" म्हणून ओळखले जाते.एखाद्या विशिष्ट ठिकाणी स्कीइंगच्या आसपास संपूर्ण सुट्ट्यांचे नियोजन केले जाऊ शकते."" स्कीइंगची कल्पना फार जुनी आहे — गुहांमध्ये रेखाटलेली स्कीयर्सची चित्रे अगदी इसा पूर्व ५००० मधील आहेत! डाउनहिल स्कीइंग १७ व्या शतकापासून खेळ म्हणून परिचित आहे आणि १८६१ मध्ये ऑस्ट्रेलियातील नॉर्वेजियन लोकांनी पहिला मनोरंजक स्की क्लब सुरू केला होता."
mt: "Downhill snowsports, which includes skiing and snowboarding, which are popular sports involving sliding down a snow-covered slope on skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. ""Skiing is a main journey-oriented undertaking to be done with many enthusiastic people, sometimes called ""ski bums."" A whole vacation can be planned around skiing at a particular place."" The idea of skiing is very old — drawings of skiers in caves date back to 5000 BC! Downhill skiing has been known as a sport since the 17th century and the first recreational ski club was started by Norwegian immigrants in Australia in 1861."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: "डाउनहिल स्नोस्पोर्ट्स, ज्यामध्ये स्कीइंग आणि स्नोबोर्डिंगचा समावेश आहे, जे स्की किंवा तुमच्या पायाला जोडलेल्या स्नोबोर्डसह बर्फाच्छादित भूभागावर खालील दिशेने स्लाइडिंग करण्याचे लोकप्रिय खेळ समाविष्ट आहेत. ""स्कीइंग हा अनेक उत्साही लोकांसह करावयाचा मुख्य प्रवास विषयक उपक्रम आहे, ज्यास कधीकधी """"स्की बम्स,"""" म्हणून ओळखले जाते.एखाद्या विशिष्ट ठिकाणी स्कीइंगच्या आसपास संपूर्ण सुट्ट्यांचे नियोजन केले जाऊ शकते."" स्कीइंगची कल्पना फार जुनी आहे — गुहांमध्ये रेखाटलेली स्कीयर्सची चित्रे अगदी इसा पूर्व ५००० मधील आहेत! डाउनहिल स्कीइंग १७ व्या शतकापासून खेळ म्हणून परिचित आहे आणि १८६१ मध्ये ऑस्ट्रेलियातील नॉर्वेजियन लोकांनी पहिला मनोरंजक स्की क्लब सुरू केला होता."
mt: "Downhill snowsports, which includes skiing and snowboarding, which are popular sports involving sliding down a snow-covered slope on skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. ""Skiing is a main journey-oriented undertaking to be done with many enthusiastic people, sometimes called ""ski bums."" A whole vacation can be planned around skiing at a particular place."" The idea of skiing is very old — drawings of skiers in caves date back to 5000 BC! Downhill skiing has been known as a sport since the 17th century and the first recreational ski club was started by Norwegian immigrants in Australia in 1861."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: ही पूर्व आफ्रिकी बेटे आफ्रिकेच्या पूर्वेकडील किनाऱ्याच्या हिंद महासागरात आहेत. वन्यजीवांचा विचार केल्यास मादागास्कर आतापर्यंत  सर्वात मोठे आहे आणि एक स्वतःच खंड आहे. बहुतांश अधिक लहान बेटे स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रे आहेत, किंवा फ्रान्ससोबत सहयोगी आहेत, आणि त्यांना लक्झरी बीच रिसॉर्ट्स म्हणतात. अरबांनी या जमिनीवर इस्लाम आणला आणि कोमोरोस आणि मायोटे मध्ये त्याच्या प्रसार मोठ्या प्रमाणात झाला. युरोपीय प्रभाव आणि वसाहतीकरण 15 व्या शतकात सुरु झाले, जसे पोर्तुगीझ शोधक वास्को द गामा ला युरोप मधून भारताकडे जाण्याचा केप मार्ग गवसला.
mt: This is a group of islands off the eastern coast of Africa in the Indian Ocean. In terms of wildlife, Madagascar is the largest and is also a separate continent. Most of the smaller islands are independent states, or are associated with France, and are called the luxury beach resorts. Arabs brought Islam to this land and its spread in the Comoros and Mayotte was large. European influence and colonization began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape route to India from Europe.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: सूर्योदय पहाण्यासाठी इस्टरची रात्र खुल्या आकाशाखाली जागे राहून व्यतीत  करण्याची परंपरा आहे. या परंपरेसाठी अर्थातच ख्रिश्चन धर्मशास्त्रामध्ये स्पष्टीकरणे आहेत, परंतु हा एक ख्रिस्तपूर्व काळातील आरंभाचा किंवा प्रजनन विधी असावा. अधिक पारंपारिक चर्च सहसा इस्टर विकेंडच्या दरम्यान शनिवारी रात्री इस्टर जागरण साजरे करतात त्यासोबतच ख्रिस्ताचे पुनरुत्थान साजरे करण्यासाठी मध्यरात्रीच्या वेळी सामुहिक स्वरुपात उत्सव साजरा करतात.
mt: The tradition of staying up all night to see the sunrise on Easter is a Christian tradition, but it is also an ancient fertility ritual. More traditional church services are often held on Saturday night during Easter weekend, and the resurrection of Christ is celebrated in a group ceremony at midnight.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: इक्वेडोरमध्ये आंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानातळे किंवा सीमेवरील प्रवेशस्थळांतून प्रवेश करण्यासाठी क्युबाच्या नागरिकांकडे आमंत्रण पत्र असणे इक्वेडोरसाठी आवश्यक आहे. हे पत्र इक्वेडोरियन परराष्ट्र व्यवहार मंत्रालयाने कायदेशीर केले पाहिजे आणि ठराविक आवश्यकतांची पूर्तता केली पाहिजे. या आवश्यकता दोन्ही देशांच्या दरम्यान ऑर्गनाइझ माइग्रेटरी फ्लो प्रदान करण्यासाठी डिझाईन केल्या आहेत. युएसचे ग्रीनकार्ड असलेल्या क्युबाच्या नागरिकांनी या अवश्यकतेतून सूट मिळवण्यासाठी इक्वेडोरच्या दूतावासाला भेट द्यावी. तुमचा पासपोर्ट तुम्ही प्रवास करत असलेल्या तारखेपासून पुढे ६ महिने वैध असावा. तुमच्या वास्तव्याचा कालावधी सिद्ध करण्यासाठी परतीचे/पुढील प्रवासाचे तिकीट आवश्यक आहे.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to have an invitation letter to enter international airports or border entry points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and comply with specific requirements designed to provide an organized migratory flow between the two countries. Cuban citizens with a green card from the US should seek an exemption from these requirements at the Ecuadorian embassy. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of your trip. Proof of your stay is required for return or future travel tickets.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: कमी उत्पन्न असलेल्या देशांमध्ये, विशेषतः जिथे कामगारांचे उत्पन्न कमी आहे अशा परदेशामध्ये चष्म्याचे दर आणखी स्वस्त असतात. घरी असताना डोळे तपासून घेणे, विशेषत: जेव्हा ते विमा संरक्षणामध्ये येते आणि प्रिस्क्रिप्शन फाइल करण्यासाठी सोबत दुसरीकडे घेऊन जाणे याचा विचार करा. अशा भागात उपलब्ध असलेल्या मोठ्या ब्रँडच्या बाबतीत 2 समस्या असू शकतात; काही नॉक ऑफ असू शकतात आणि वास्तविक अधिक महाग असू शकतात.
mt: In low-income countries, especially in countries where workers' incomes are low, glasses are cheaper abroad. Consider checking your eyes at home, especially when they come with insurance coverage and take them to the prescription file. There may be two problems with the availability of large brands; some may be knocked off and may be more expensive in reality.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: फॉकलंडचे अधिकृत चलन फॉकलंड पौंड (FKP) आहे ज्याची किंमत एका ब्रिटीश पौंड (GBP) च्या एवढीच ठरवली गेली आहे. एफआयसी वेस्ट स्टोअरमधून स्टॅनलेमध्ये स्थित बेटांवरील एकमेव बँकेत पैशांचा विनिमय करता येईल. ब्रिटिश पाउंड सहसा बेटांवर आणि स्टॅनले क्रेडिट कार्ड्समध्ये कुठेही स्वीकारले जातील तसेच युनायटेड स्टेट्सचे डॉलर्स देखील अनेकदा स्वीकारले जातील. बेटांच्या बाहेर क्रेडिट कार्ड कदाचित स्वीकारली जाणार नाहीत, तरी ब्रिटिश आणि युनायटेड स्टेटचे चलन घेतले जाईल; कोणती पेमेंट पद्धती स्वीकार्ह आहे हे मालकाला आधीच विचारून जाणून घ्या. फॉकलँडच्या चलनाचा बेटाच्या बाहेर विनिमय करणे जवळपास अशक्य आहे, त्यामुळे बेट सोडण्यापूर्वी चलन बदलून घ्या.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is pegged to the British pound (GBP). The only bank on the islands, located in Stanley, will exchange money at the FCI West Store. British pounds are rarely accepted on the islands or in Stanley credit cards, and United States dollars are also rarely accepted. Credit cards may not be accepted outside the islands, but British and United States currency will be accepted; which payment methods are accepted is determined by the owner beforehand. It is nearly impossible to exchange the currency of the Falkland Islands outside the islands, so exchange currency before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

British pounds are rarely accepted on the islands or in Stanley credit cards, and United States dollars are also rarely accepted. Credit cards may not be accepted outside the islands, but British and United States currency will be accepted; which payment methods are accepted is determined by the owner beforehand. It is nearly impossible to exchange the currency of the Falkland Islands outside the islands, so exchange currency before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: यापैकी बहुतांश मंदिरांमध्ये नोव्हेंबरची अखेर ते मेच्या मध्यापर्यंत वार्षिक उत्सव असतात, जे प्रत्येक मंदिराच्या वार्षिक कॅलेंडरनुसार भिन्न असतात. बहुतांश मंदिर उत्सव त्या मंदिराचा वर्धनपान दिन किंवा तिथल्या देवतेचा जन्मदिवस किंवा त्या मंदिराशी निगडीत अन्य एखादा प्रमुख प्रसंगाचा भाग म्हणून साजरे केले जातात. सजवलेल्या हत्तींसह काढलेल्या मिरवणुका, मंदिरातील वाद्यवृंद आणि इतर उत्सव यांसह केरळचा मंदिरांचा उत्सव पाहण्यासारखा असतो.
mt: Most of these temples have annual festivals that last from the end of November to the middle of March, which vary according to the annual calendar of each temple. Most temples celebrate their festivals on the day of the temple's anniversary or the birth day of the deity of that temple or on any other major occasion associated with that temple. The temple festival is a colorful affair with decorated elephants, music bands in the temple, and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
